item.title: Install Arch Linux UEFI with LUKS encrypted root and swap filesystems
item.author: Author
item.description: This method will ensure that your data is encrypted if your device is ever stolen. Nevertheless it might not be sufficient against such “CIA driven attacks” as the evil-maid or a coldboot attack. Before starting Download the archiso image from https://www.archlinux.org/ and its signature. To ensure that the NSA / GCHQ, any other intelligence agency nor hacker has not altered your download, generate the checksum and compare it to the one provided by ARCH Linux or use gpg to ensure your archlinux-*.
